00001 #include "FittedRmaxq.hh"

00003 namespace {
00007   const double explorationthreshold = 2.0;
00008 
00010   const double maxval = 0.0;
00011 
00014   const double discountfactor = 1.0;
00015 
00019   const double epsilon = 0.01;
00020 
00025   const int resolutionfactor = 4;
00026 
00027   StatePredicateRef truep = TrueStatePredicate::create();
00028   StatePredicateRef falsep = FalseStatePredicate::create();
00029   StateFunctionRef zerof = ZeroStateFunction::create();
00030 
00031   StateVariables dimensions;
00032 } // end of anonymous namespace
00033 
00034 TaskRef get_task_hierarchy(taskspec_t *ts)
00035 {
00036   assert(getNumIntObs(ts) == 0);
00037   // Number of state variables
00038   const unsigned dim = getNumDoubleObs(ts);
00039 
00040   // First four actions are navigational.  Fifth is used to terminate
00041   // an episode.  Remaining actions activate subgoals.
00042   int firstaction = getIntActMin(ts, 0);
00043   int lastaction = getIntActMax(ts, 0);
00044   int num_actions = lastaction - firstaction + 1;
00045   int numgoals = num_actions - 4 - 1; // Four movement actions, one end-of-task
00046 
00047   std::vector<TaskRef> root_children;
00048 
00049   // Create four navigational actions.
00050   dimensions.clear();
00051   for (unsigned i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
00052     dimensions[i] = 1.0 / (getDoubleObsMax(ts, i) - getDoubleObsMin(ts, i));
00053 
00054   // Depend only on first two state variables: x-y coordinates.
00055   static const char *udrl[] = { "up", "down", "right", "left" };
00056   for (int i = firstaction; i < firstaction + 4; ++i) {
00057     TaskRef task = DiscretizedPrimitiveTask::create(udrl[i - firstaction],
00058                                                     i,
00059                                                     explorationthreshold,
00060                                                     maxval,
00061                                                     resolutionfactor,
00062                                                     dimensions,
00063                                                     truep);
00064     root_children.push_back(task);
00065   }
00066 
00067   // Fifth action only available if all subgoals have been achieved,
00068   // and its behavior otherwise does not depend on the current state.
00069   std::map<unsigned,double> goalcondition;
00070   for (unsigned i = 2; i < dim; ++i)
00071     goalcondition[i] = 1.0;
00072   StatePredicateRef all_goals =
00073     GoalStatePredicate::create(goalcondition.begin(), goalcondition.end());
00074   TaskRef final_action = DiscretizedPrimitiveTask::create("finish",
00075                                                           firstaction + 4,
00076                                                           explorationthreshold,
00077                                                           maxval,
00078                                                           resolutionfactor,
00079                                                           dimensions,
00080                                                           all_goals);
00081   root_children.push_back(final_action);
00082 
00083   // Subgoal attainment actions depend on three state variables: the
00084   // x-y coordinates and the corresponding goal attainment flag.
00085   // These actions should only be available when the corresponding
00086   // flag is not yet set.
00087   for (int i = 0; i < numgoals; ++i) {
00088     goalcondition.clear();
00089     goalcondition[i + 2] = 0.0;
00090     StatePredicateRef precond =
00091       GoalStatePredicate::create(goalcondition.begin(), goalcondition.end());
00092     goalcondition[i + 2] = 1.0;
00093     StatePredicateRef postcond =
00094       GoalStatePredicate::create(goalcondition.begin(), goalcondition.end());
00095     dimensions[i+2] = 1.0 / (getDoubleObsMax(ts, i+2) - getDoubleObsMin(ts, i+2));
00096     std::string name = "pickup";
00097     name.append(1, 'A' + i);
00098     TaskRef subgoal_primitive =
00099       DiscretizedPrimitiveTask::create(name,
00100                                        i + firstaction + 5,
00101                                        explorationthreshold,
00102                                        maxval,
00103                                        resolutionfactor,
00104                                        dimensions,
00105                                        precond);
00106 
00107     root_children.push_back(subgoal_primitive);
00108 
00109     dimensions.erase(i+2);
00110   }
00111 
00112   // Finally, create root task with full state variable representation.
00113   for (unsigned i = 2; i < dim; ++i)
00114     dimensions[i] = 1.0 / (getDoubleObsMax(ts, i) - getDoubleObsMin(ts, i));
00115   AveragerRef value_averager = ProjectionAverager::create(dimensions);
00116   return CompositeTask::create("ROOT",
00117                                root_children.begin(),
00118                                root_children.end(),
00119                                truep,
00120                                falsep,
00121                                zerof,
00122                                value_averager,
00123                                discountfactor,
00124                                epsilon);
00125 }
